channel.title: Visualisation on Kathryn Loosemore PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Visualisation on Kathryn Loosemore PhD

item.title: ETA Victims Over Time
item.description: ETA’s attacks and victims (1961 - 2010) plotted on a map to demonstrate the impact of the terrorist group’s campaign across Europe. The data allows for four separate visualisations: Attacks Mortal victims (deaths caused by ETA) Injuries Kidnappings Attacks Visualisation of ETA Attacks from 1961 to 2010 Mortal Victims Visualisation of Mortal Victims of ETA activities from 1961 to 2010 Injuries Visualisation of Injuries caused by ETA from 1961 to 2010
